snippet: Analysts tote up the demographics for one side or the other, but is anyone listening to what minorities who are disaffected from the political process actually want?
abstract: Analysts tote up the demographics for one side or the other, but is anyone listening to what minorities who are disaffected from the political process actually want?

byline.original: By ZOLTAN HAJNAL and TAEKU LEE

headline.main: The Untold Future of American Politics
